title: A Bat, a ball and a boy
brief_description: Famous Australian cricketers, including Sir Donald Bradman, Richie Benaud, Ray Lindwall, Len Hutton and Neil Harvey illustrate how to improve a boy’s game from batting to bowling to fielding. Includes archival footage of some of Australia’s greatest players.
